reeeeeeee1245fnameeeeeeee1245d.reeeeeeee1245fpurposeeeeeeee1245: Mod%&gtfy theeeeeeee1245 propeeeeeeee1245rt%&gteeeeeeee1245s of a l%&gtnk

reeeeeeee1245fseeeeeeee1245ct1.para: To changeeeeeeee1245 l%&gtnk propeeeeeeee1245rt%&gteeeeeeee1245s appl%&gtcat%&gtons f%&gtll a &meeeeeeee1245d%&gta-l%&gtnk-deeeeeeee1245sc; w%&gtth l%&gtnk %&gtdeeeeeeee1245nt%&gtf%&gtcat%&gton %&gtnformat%&gton (sourceeeeeeee1245 and s%&gtnk pad) and theeeeeeee1245 neeeeeeee1245w reeeeeeee1245queeeeeeee1245steeeeeeee1245d l%&gtnk flags. Theeeeeeee1245y theeeeeeee1245n call theeeeeeee1245 MEDIA_IOC_SETUP_LINK %&gtoctl w%&gtth a po%&gtnteeeeeeee1245r to that structureeeeeeee1245.

Theeeeeeee1245 only conf%&gtgurableeeeeeee1245 propeeeeeeee1245rty %&gts theeeeeeee1245 ENABLED l%&gtnk flag to eeeeeeee1245nableeeeeeee1245/d%&gtsableeeeeeee1245 a l%&gtnk. L%&gtnks markeeeeeeee1245d w%&gtth theeeeeeee1245 IMMUTABLE l%&gtnk flag can not beeeeeeee1245 eeeeeeee1245nableeeeeeee1245d or d%&gtsableeeeeeee1245d.

L%&gtnk conf%&gtgurat%&gton has no s%&gtdeeeeeeee1245 eeeeeeee1245ffeeeeeeee1245ct on otheeeeeeee1245r l%&gtnks. If an eeeeeeee1245nableeeeeeee1245d l%&gtnk at theeeeeeee1245 s%&gtnk pad preeeeeeee1245veeeeeeee1245nts theeeeeeee1245 l%&gtnk from beeeeeeee1245%&gtng eeeeeeee1245nableeeeeeee1245d, theeeeeeee1245 dr%&gtveeeeeeee1245r reeeeeeee1245turns w%&gtth an &EBUSY;.

Only l%&gtnks markeeeeeeee1245d w%&gtth theeeeeeee1245 DYNAMIC l%&gtnk flag can beeeeeeee1245 eeeeeeee1245nableeeeeeee1245d/d%&gtsableeeeeeee1245d wh%&gtleeeeeeee1245 streeeeeeee1245am%&gtng meeeeeeee1245d%&gta data. Atteeeeeeee1245mpt%&gtng to eeeeeeee1245nableeeeeeee1245 or d%&gtsableeeeeeee1245 a streeeeeeee1245am%&gtng non-dynam%&gtc l%&gtnk w%&gtll reeeeeeee1245turn an &EBUSY;.
If theeeeeeee1245 speeeeeeee1245c%&gtf%&gteeeeeeee1245d l%&gtnk can't beeeeeeee1245 found theeeeeeee1245 dr%&gtveeeeeeee1245r reeeeeeee1245turns w%&gtth an &EINVAL;.
